# Task 4: Visualizing Large Distributions
https://byui.instructure.com/courses/134980/pages/task-4-visualizing-large-distributions?module_item_id=17322326

## Load Data
```{r}
install.packages("nycflights13")
install.packages("ggplot2")
```


```{r}
library(ggplot2)
library(nycflights13)
```

## Preview the data
```{r}
head(nycflights13::flights)
?flights
```
```{r}
ggplot(flights) + 
  geom_point(aes(x=distance, y=air_time))
```
